title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: Between life and death there is a library. When Nora Seed finds herself in the Midnight Library, she has a chance to make things right.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: Tiny Changes, Remarkable Results: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this incredible new science-based thriller.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking.

title: Klara and the Sun
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
description: From the Nobel laureate author comes a magnificent novel about an unforgettable narrator.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a young girl who, kept out of school, leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD.

title: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
description: A multi-generational family saga that tackles American history and the construction of race.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: For years, rumors of the 'Marsh Girl' have haunted Barkley Cove. Then the time comes when she's needed.

title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
author: V.E. Schwab
description: A young woman makes a Faustian bargain to live forever and is cursed to be forgotten by everyone.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind from the Stone Age to the Silicon Age.

title: Circe
author: Madeline Miller
description: The story of the goddess Circe, who transforms rivals into monsters and crosses paths with many figures.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: Aging Hollywood icon Evelyn Hugo is finally ready to tell the truth about her glamorous life.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set in the far future amidst a feudal interstellar society, it tells the story of young Paul Atreides.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Bilbo Baggins is a hobbit who enjoys a comfortable, unambitious life, rarely traveling.
